actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to provide for the study of the Pike National Historic Trail.
short_title: Pike National Historic Trail Study Act of 2010

summary.text: Pike National Historic Trail Study Act of 2010 - Amends the National Trails System Act to require a study for the designation of Pike's Trail, a series of routes that follow the route taken by Lt. Zebulon Montgomery Pike during the 1806-1807 Pike expedition that began in Fort Bellefontaine, Missouri, and ended in Natchitoches, Louisiana, as a national historic trail.

titles.title: Pike National Historic Trail Study Act of 2010
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to provide for the study of the Pike National Historic Trail.
